abstract_summ: Keywords of all related studies could be divided into 4 clusters: "Pathological research," "Epidemiology research," "Clinical research," and "Mechanism research.This study aims to explore the distribution of research capabilities of countries, institutions, and researchers, and the hotspots and frontiers of coronavirus research in the past two decades.International collaborations promoted study progress, and universities and academies act as the main force in coronavirus research.Notably, COVID-19 must become the research hotspot of coronavirus research, and clinical research on COVID-19 may be the key to defeating this epidemic.Therefore, more and more efforts will be put into mechanism research and vaccine research and development, which can be helpful to deal with the epidemic.
title_summ: A Global Analysis of LiteratureResearch Progress of Coronavirus Based on Bibliometric AnalysisA Bibliometric Analysis of COVID-19 Research Activity: A Call for Increased OutputCOVID-19 will stimulate a new coronavirus research breakthrough: a 20-year bibliometric analysis.Studies of Novel Coronavirus Disease 19 (COVID-19) Pandemic: A Global Analysis of LiteratureTwenty-Year Span of Global Coronavirus Research Trends: A Bibliometric AnalysisWhen science goes viral: The research response during three months of the COVID-19 outbreakStudies of Novel Coronavirus Disease 19 (COVID-19) Pandemic:[Visual analysis of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) studies based on bibliometrics].The status and trends of coronavirus research: A global bibliometric and visualized analysis.[Visualization analysis on treatment of coronavirus based on knowledge graph].Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19): A Machine Learning Bibliometric Analysis.Analysis of knowledge bases and research hotspots of coronavirus from the perspective of mapping knowledge domain.Analysis in databases and open access repositoriesBibliometric Analysis of Global Scientific Research on SARSCoV-2 (COVID-19)Analysis of the scientific literature in the first 30 Days of the novel coronavirus outbreak.
title_abstract_phrases: Keywords of all related studies could be divided into 4 clusters: "Pathological research," "Epidemiology research," "Clinical research," and "Mechanism research.This study aims to explore the distribution of research capabilities of countries, institutions, and researchers, and the hotspots and frontiers of coronavirus research in the past two decades.International collaborations promoted study progress, and universities and academies act as the main force in coronavirus research.Notably, COVID-19 must become the research hotspot of coronavirus research, and clinical research on COVID-19 may be the key to defeating this epidemic.Therefore, more and more efforts will be put into mechanism research and vaccine research and development, which can be helpful to deal with the epidemic.[Visualization analysis on treatment of coronavirus based on knowledge graph].OBJECTIVE
